title: EIPIP Meeting 93
body:
# Date and Time

Nov 01, 2023 at 14:00 UTC
# Location

Zoom: TBA in the Discord #eip-editing channel

YouTube Live Stream/Recording: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxpLrRIkDlBjDUUrGgF91pQw

# Agenda
### 1. Discuss Open Issues/PRs, and other topics
- [ ] EIP-ERC repo split
  -  Update from editors' meeting
  - [Pending tasks for ERC migration](https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/issues/1) 
  - [Migrating Pull Requests from ethereum/EIPs to ethereum/ERCs](https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/issues/8)
- [ ] Web Page Rendering for EIP & ERC
- [ ] Topic Group
  - [EIP Editors & Associates](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1VaazpOfy4v2wXKvrCIEiU9zhGS9jV522KoonqZR9DrA/edit#gid=0) based on repo split.

#### Call for Input

<google-sheets-html-origin><style type="text/css"><!--td {border: 1px solid #cccccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}--></style>

Call For Input | Status | Result | Comments
-- | -- | -- | --
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/283 | Open | - | Active for collecting response (till Nov 16)


#### Changes to `Final` proposals
_TBA_

Manual Merge
_TBA_

### 2. Discussion continued or updates from past meetings

- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7806
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7550 
- [ ] Call for Input 
- [ ] Repo split - [EIP-7329](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7329)
  - Updates from the Editors' meeting
  - [ ] https://hackmd.io/A1zfRkO7RKKV6BIaSXpcbw


### 3. EIPs Insight - Monthly EIPs status reporting.
- [Hackmd](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight/https%3A%2F%2Fhackmd.io%2F%40poojaranjan%2FEIPsInsightSeptember2023)
- [EIPsInsight.com](https://eipsinsight.com/insight/2023/9)

### 4. [EIP Editing Office Hour](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EIPEditingOfficeHour)
- Can we merge All ERC Dev Meeting & EIP Editing Office Hour?
- Rename it to ERC Office Hour?
- Agenda [Meeting 26](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/277)

### 5. Review action items from earlier meetings
- [Summary meeting 92](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/281#issuecomment-1768740036)

### 6. Announcement
